meta.title: Clean Power Programs for California Cities | Humble
meta.description: Replace gas generators at farmers markets, parks, and city events with managed battery fleet programs. Zero emissions, zero noise, measurable impact.

hero.title: Quiet, Clean Power for City Events, Markets, and Field Crews
hero.description: Replace gas generators at farmers markets, park rentals, and city-sponsored events with a managed battery fleet. Designed for California cities and community choice aggregators.

benefits.title: Built Around How Cities Actually Use Power

items.title: Public Works Crews
items.description: Portable 3 kW units for daily field work – charged overnight in the yard. City-owned hardware with optional fleet management support.

items.title: Farmers Markets
items.description: Replace vendor-owned generators with city-managed batteries for every stall. Weekly drop-off and pickup or check-out system.

items.title: City Events & Festivals
items.description: Stages, sound, lighting, food vendors – powered quietly with battery systems. Vendor-managed delivery, setup, and teardown included.

items.title: Design Pilot Program
items.description: Co-design scope and budget aligned with CPA grants. Support RFP development with performance-based specifications.

items.title: Deploy Managed Fleet
items.description: Launch at farmers markets, parks, and events. Hybrid model: city-owned units for crews, vendor-managed services for public events.

items.title: Measure Health & Cost Impacts
items.description: Track emissions avoided, noise reduction, vendor participation, and utilization across all four scenarios with real-time telemetry.

items.title: Support Policy & Scaling
items.description: Help staff make the case for permanent clean power requirements in event permits and park rentals. Transition path for vendors.
